channel.title: [PI] - 2 (should be) simple problems

item.title: [PI] - 2 (should be) simple problems
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

[quote=“alexis1, post:2, topic:461803”]For the npc drops open NPCdrops.TSM and you should see something like this for every npc

#Revenant Ork // this is just for you to see the npc name.
6713:40 995:30000 565:1 554:60 1079:1 1093:1 1127:1 1432:1 1333:1 1185:1 2366:1 1249:1
4585:1 14876:1

Blue = Npc Id
Red = Drop rarity
Brown = Item id
Green = Amount of item dropped[/quote]THANK YOU SO MUCH! I was just in the wrong class. Thanks.
Can anybody help me with the other problem?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] - 2 (should be) simple problems
item.dc:creator: @alexis1 alexis1
item.description:
@alexis1 wrote:

For the npc drops open NPCdrops.TSM and you should see something like this for every npc

#Revenant Ork // this is just for you to see the npc name.
6713:40 995:30000 565:1 554:60 1079:1 1093:1 1127:1 1432:1 1333:1 1185:1 2366:1 1249:1
4585:1 14876:1

Blue = Npc Id
Red = Drop rarity
Brown = Item id
Green = Amount of item dropped

item.title: [PI] - 2 (should be) simple problems
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

case 114112: //New years if (c.newYear == 0) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ New Years Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("To start go to Camelot, talk to the Divine Gudie.",8145); if (c.newYear == 1) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ New Years Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@To start go to Camelot, talk to the Divine Gudie.",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("The Divine Guide has asked me to collect him;",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Seven Dragon Bones, from a Dragon.",8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("One Gold Ring that I Crafted.",8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("and 10 Magic Logs, chopped from a Magic tree.",8150); if (c.newYear == 2) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ New Years Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@To start go to Camelot, talk to the Divine Gudie.",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@The Divine Guide has asked me to collect him;",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Seven Dragon Bones, from a Dragon.",8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@One Gold Ring that I Crafted.",8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@and 10 Magic Logs, chopped from a Magic tree.",8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("I should probably speak to the Guide now...",8151); if (c.newYear == 3) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@ ~ New Years Event ~",8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@To start go to Camelot, talk to the Divine Gudie.",8145); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@The Divine Guide has asked me to collect him;",8147); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Seven Dragon Bones, from a Dragon.",8148); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@One Gold Ring that I Crafted.",8149); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@and 10 Magic Logs, chopped from a Magic tree.",8150); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@I should probably speak to the Guide now...",8151); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@You have completed the New Years Event.",8152); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Congratulations, you have been rewarded with;",8153); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@One unusual Ring, and 25m to start out with.",8154); } } } } c.sendMessage("You have from 12/31/2012 - 1/2/2013 to complete this Event."); break;
You see nothing “Error wise” is wrong with it. A bit sloppy yes, but if you read it, how would I make that happen? It doesn’t open after you’ve started the quest. it just sends the message.

Read full topic
